Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section and many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393551) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393551)
